filter: winlog.event_id: 7040 AND winlog.provider_name: "Service Control Manager" AND message: "The start type of the Windows Modules Installer service was changed from auto start to demand start."
description: e.g. Event-ID 7040 *** ES 6 to 7 changes: event_id -> winlog.event_id | source_name -> winlog.provider_name ***
